model

Class BoardSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.BoardSettings

  • public class BoardSettings
extends java.util.Observable
    Boardsettings sets the settings of the active board, where the offsets,cell sizes and colors are defined. The offsets variables are the context between the canvas and the board, and the cell sizes is the size of each cell shown on the board. Boardsettings extends Observable
    Author:
    Ali Arfan, Kent Erlend Bratteng Knudsen, Stian Tornholm Grimsgaard

      BoardSettings()

        public void setBoardBorderColor(javafx.scene.paint.Color borderColor)
        setBoardBorderColor 
         public void setBgColor({@link Color} borderColor)

        Sets the color of border of the active board, the border is shown around the board. The border changes size as the board resizes.

        Parameters:
        borderColor - - The color to be set as the border color.
